#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
main()
{
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int count=0,i,j;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            j=i;
        while(j>0)
        {
            if(j%2!=0)
            {
                count++;
            }
            j=j/2;
        }
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
